entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: SSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
